description: Police were investigating domestic violence in a village, and the suspect has now been found dead.
title: France police shootings: Three officers killed by gunman who is later found dead
title_page: France police shootings: Three officers killed by gunman who is later found dead - BBC News
maintext: As the sequence of events became clear, prosecutor Eric Maillaud described the scene as a "real war zone" as he described a man who had been in conflict with his wife and had an arsenal of weapons. "What's certain is that he was totally battle-hardened in handling weapons," he told reporters.
